description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named HelloController that provides basic endpoints for service status, documentation redirection, health checks, and app info, with Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for service status, documentation, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the service is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects clients to the Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns an application health status, typically used for health checks.
